name: Voxel Knight (Lumidi)
description:
Voxel Knight is a Game project for "Brackeys" Game Jam 2018.

It's a game about a Knight made of voxels, how has a magic FLASHLIGHT to shoot "Cube Zombies" (they are actually cute cubes LOL).

The ultimate goal is to get to the "Golden Brackeys Trophy"!

It's a platformer game made in Unity, the goal is to complete the full level as fast a possible. Just avoid to fall, hit obstacles or let the "Cube Zoombies" get you!

3D Models, Textures, Programming and even Music was developed by Me! (Lumidi - Alex Z)

Please Help me to improve!  =D  leave your comments about:

- Does the control feels responsive?
- What was your favorite part?
- How can I improve the gameplay?

You can follow me for more updates and more projects in Twitter: @LumidiDev
